goal.en: A required undergraduate course with three credits (4 hours) for each semester, aiming at providing an introduction to dynamic equations of atmospheric flow and the related theories, from mesoscale to large-scale, from the planetary boundary layer to troposphere, numerical methods to comprehensive models, to acquire an overall understanding.
goal.ch: 為大學部上、下各三學分(4小時)的必修課，旨在提供大氣運動的動力方程式及相關理論介紹，從中尺度到大尺度，由行星邊界層至對流層，由數值方法到完整模式，得到整體性的了解。

content.en:
An Introduction to Dynamic Meteorology:
James R. Holton and Gregory J. Hakim, 2012
Ch7: Baroclinic Development
Ch8: The Planetary Boundary Layer
Ch9: Mesoscale Circulations
Ch10: The General Circulation
Ch11: Tropical Dynamics
Ch13: Numerical Modeling and Prediction
